CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
CurrentVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
OldVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Teams Premium
CurrentVersion.description: After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. A new report within Microsoft 365 admin center Usage reports for Teams Premium.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Teams Premium
OldVersion.description: A new report within Microsoft 365 admin center Usage reports for Teams Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users, and German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - User scoping role-based access control (RBAC)
OldVersion.description: This introduces delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate messages for only German users, and German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Recommended policy scope
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage policy scope insights to understand the aggregated volume of policy violations that are missed from users that are not currently scoped into the policy. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Recommended policy scope
OldVersion.description: Leverage policy scope insights to understand the aggregated volume of policy violations that are missed from users that are not currently scoped into the policy. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
OldVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
OldVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
OldVersion.description: The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
OldVersion.description: Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, data governance, and risk and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now access all Purview solutions in one single portal, as well as experiences such as settings, global search, recommendations, and roles and permissions management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
OldVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, data governance, and risk and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now access all Purview solutions in one single portal, as well as experiences such as settings, global search, recommendations, and roles and permissions management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Plugins in copilot.microsoft.com
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use plugins via copilot.microsoft.com to expand Copilot skills.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Plugins in copilot.microsoft.com
OldVersion.description: Users can now use plugins via copilot.microsoft.com to expand Copilot skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
OldVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
OldVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
OldVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
OldVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
OldVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Endpoint Privilege Management on single session Azure Virtual Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, you can use Endpoint Privilege Management elevation rules and policy to more easily manage standard users on Azure Virtual Desktop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Endpoint Privilege Management on single session Azure Virtual Desktop
OldVersion.description: With this release, you can use Endpoint Privilege Management elevation rules and policy to more easily manage standard users on Azure Virtual Desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Improved elevation detection
CurrentVersion.description: This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Improved elevation detection
OldVersion.description: This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Endpoint Privilege Management rules support specifying allowable command arguments
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint Privilege Management rules support specifying a list of allowable command parameters, ensuring elevation for only the allowed or mandatory arguments.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Endpoint Privilege Management rules support specifying allowable command arguments
OldVersion.description: Endpoint Privilege Management rules support specifying a list of allowable command parameters, ensuring elevation for only the allowed or mandatory arguments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
OldVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
CurrentVersion.description: These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
OldVersion.description: These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
OldVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
OldVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Network Share Coverage and Exclusion Support on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, Sensitive data in files that are stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Network Share Coverage and Exclusion Support on Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: With this feature, Sensitive data in files that are stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Amplify editor
CurrentVersion.description: The superpowers of Microsoft 365 Copilot will be directly available to you in the Viva Amplify editing experience to revolutionize the way you create and enhance content. Auto-rewrite will create suggestions based on the text you've written. Also, you can expand or condense what you have written. Copilot in Amplify will also help you adjust the tone of your content to ensure consistency across your communications and to best suit your audience, whether you need a casual tone for social messages, an engaging tone to compel and draw in your audience, or a professional tone for business communications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Amplify editor
OldVersion.description: The superpowers of Copilot will be directly available to you in the Amplify editing experience to revolutionize the way you create and enhance content. Auto-rewrite will create suggestions based on the text you've written. Additionally, you can expand or condense what you have written. Copilot in Amplify will also help you adjust the tone of your content to ensure consistency across your communications and to best suit your audience, whether you need a casual tone for social messages, an engaging tone to compel and draw in your audience, or a professional tone for business communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updates to mail sharing functionality with Cloud Policy Service when setting "Turn off sharing recommendation"
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the office Cloud Policy Service setting "Turn off sharing recommendation" will disable the ability for users to share folders with individual users. Currently, the policy blocked users' ability to update default and anonymous permission levels for shared folders. This functionality will remain and will not be changed. The current policy and how it works with calendar sharing will not be impacted by this change and will remain as implemented. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Updates to mail sharing functionality with Cloud Policy Service when setting "Turn off sharing recommendation"
OldVersion.description: Updates to the office Cloud Policy Service setting "Turn off sharing recommendation" will disable the ability for users to share folders with individual users. Currently, the policy blocked users' ability to update default and anonymous permission levels for shared folders. This functionality will remain and will not be changed. The current policy and how it works with calendar sharing will not be impacted by this change and will remain as implemented. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well. A Teams Premium license is required for the organizer role to deploy this feature within town hall instances.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
OldVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
CurrentVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
OldVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need, all in one hub of content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
OldVersion.description:
Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and
stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need,
all in one hub of content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.description: The superpowers of Microsoft 365 Copilot will be directly available to you in the Viva Amplify editing experience to revolutionize the way you create and enhance content. Auto-rewrite will create suggestions based on the text you've written. Also, you can expand or condense what you have written. Copilot in Amplify will also help you adjust the tone of your content to ensure consistency across your communications and to best suit your audience, whether you need a casual tone for social messages, an engaging tone to compel and draw in your audience, or a professional tone for business communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Education grid view refresh
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams for Education now has a new refreshed grid view, wherein you will directly be able to get to your assignments or classwork for your classes in grid view. This feature will make it easier and faster for you to get to your assignments, classwork or channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updates to mail sharing functionality with Cloud Policy Service when setting "Turn off sharing recommendation"
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the office Cloud Policy Service setting "Turn off sharing recommendation" will disable the ability for users to share folders with individual users. Currently, the policy blocked users' ability to update default and anonymous permission levels for shared folders. This functionality will remain and will not be changed. The current policy and how it works with calendar sharing will not be impacted by this change and will remain as implemented. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well. A Teams Premium license is required for the organizer role to deploy this feature within town hall instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
CurrentVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: With a Teams Shared Device license assigned to a desk pool, admins can view valuable analytics for these spaces including number of peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy under 'Reports' in the portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need, all in one hub of content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide
